summary: In Wyoming, mountain trapper Yancy goes to the nearest town to trade his pelts but gets into trouble when he tries to save runaway saloon girl Rosalie from her shameful job.
cast: Audie Murphy|Joanne Dru|Gilbert Roland|Sandra Dee|Jim Backus|Peter Breck|Wesley Marie Tackitt|Strother Martin|George Mitchell|Betty Harford|Lillian Adams|Henry Amargo|Joe Bassett|Val Benedict|Wag Blesing|Willie Bloom|Rudy Bowman|Chet Brandenburg|Alexander Campbell|Mary Carver|Albert Cavens|Zelda Cleaver|Sidney Clute|Bing Conley|Anne Cornwall|Rosemary Eliot|William Fawcett|Bess Flowers|Louise Glenn|Herschel Graham|Signe Hack|Harold 'Tommy' Hart|Cisco Houston|Joe Hyams|Arte Johnson|Duke Johnson|Fred Johnson|Donald Kerr|Ann Kunde|Karyn Kupcinet|William Lally|Tex Lambert|Syl Lamont|Walter Lawrence|Mel Leonard|Louis Manley|Ada Mae Moore|Barbara Morris|Bob Perry|Charles Perry|Virginia Pherrin|Walter Pietila|John Qualls|Stephen Roberts|Angelo Rossitto|Charles Seel|Jim Sheppard|Charles Sherlock|Leslie Sketchley|Ray Spiker|Vincent St. Cyr|Bert Stevens|Edson Stroll|Charles Tannen|Marc Towers|Joe Walls|Frank Wolff
title: Almas inocentes
